data.title: Larry A. Johnson Obituary 2022
authors: McGuire & Davies Funeral Home and Crematory
data.meta_description: Larry A. Johnson, 74, of Monmouth, IL, passed away at 4:13 am, Friday, January 14, 2022, at his home.                                  Larry was born April 27, 1947, in Monmouth...
data.meta_site_name: McGuire & Davies Funeral Home and Crematory
data.text:
Larry A. Johnson, 74, of Monmouth, IL, passed away at 4:13 am, Friday, January 14, 2022, at his home.

Larry was born April 27, 1947, in Monmouth, IL the son of Harold R. and Winona E. (Horton) Johnson. He was raised and educated in the Gladstone area, graduating from Union High School.

Larry married Paula J. Logsdon in Raritan, IL on November 20, 1975, and she passed away on September 15, 2021.

Larry farmed near Smithshire, IL for several years. He later worked at the Monmouth Sale Barn before going to work at Farmland in Monmouth, Il before retiring in 1999.

He enjoyed fishing, camping, horses, taking Sunday drives with his family and talking about his life.

Survivors include his 2 sons, Chance Logsdon-Hunter of Smithshire, IL and John Johnson of Monmouth, IL; his daughter, Sarah (Arthur) Bigsby of Bushnell, IL; 9 grandchildren, Brittany, Kenny, Brendan, Ashley, Tamara, Chance, Collin, Zack, and Phoebe; 5 great grandchildren, Spencer, Bryson, Hunter, Rider, Aubrey and Tatum.

He was preceded in death by his parents, wife, and one brother, Dale Johnson.
